Whats it all about?

SensIT is transitioning from centralized field exercises to distibuted 24/7 experimentation sites hosted by researchers.

ISI is providing an interface portal for remote monitoring and sensor querying of these sites over the internet.

ISI will also help with

  • video monitoring
  • target ground truth
  • event logging
  • replay

BAE Systems is the first site to come online. Others are planned shortly. ISI Will come up with motes.

ISI portal is coming up shortly. Viki Edit
